nodes.text: A planet was located in the Unknown Regions, and was the place to which Thrawn was exiled by the Chiss.

Thrawn was rediscovered here when the Strikefast chased Booster Terrik into the Unknown Regions, forcing Terrik to land on the planet. Thrawn managed to manipulate the Imperials into getting aboard their ship as a way off the planet.

As Thrawn was looking for a way off the planet when the Imperials arrived, it is implied that this planet had no other sentient inhabitants, although there were other non-sentient species, namely, small, flying critters.
